seisflows3.tests.test_config

Test the SeisFlows3 configuration script, which configures the compute system and the working environment required for SF3 to run properly

Module Contents

Functions

copy_par_file(tmpdir)

Copy the template parameter file into the temporary test directory

sfinit(tmpdir, copy_par_file)

Re-used function that will initate a SeisFlows3 working environment in

test_seisflows_constants()

Ensure that the constants set in the Config file have not changed

test_init_seisflows(sfinit)

Make sure that initiation of the modular approach of seisflows works

test_save_and_load(sfinit)

Test saving the current session to disk

test_seisflows_paths_parameters(sfinit)

Test the class that makes inputting and checking paths and parameters easier

test_custom_import(sfinit)

Test that importing based on internal modules works for various inputs

Attributes

TEST_DIR

seisflows3.tests.test_config.TEST_DIR
seisflows3.tests.test_config.copy_par_file(tmpdir)

Copy the template parameter file into the temporary test directory :rtype: str :return: location of the parameter file

seisflows3.tests.test_config.sfinit(tmpdir, copy_par_file)

Re-used function that will initate a SeisFlows3 working environment in sys modules :return:

seisflows3.tests.test_config.test_seisflows_constants()

Ensure that the constants set in the Config file have not changed Essentially a double check to make sure these things haven’t been edited because the rest of the package depends on these being accesible and the same

seisflows3.tests.test_config.test_init_seisflows(sfinit)

Make sure that initiation of the modular approach of seisflows works as expected. That is, that system-wide accessible modules are instantiated with the accepted naming schema

Note

This assumes that the parameter file is set up correctly, which it should be if it’s coming from the test data directory

Returns

seisflows3.tests.test_config.test_save_and_load(sfinit)

Test saving the current session to disk :return:

seisflows3.tests.test_config.test_seisflows_paths_parameters(sfinit)

Test the class that makes inputting and checking paths and parameters easier Recreates the required() function at the top of each class.

seisflows3.tests.test_config.test_custom_import(sfinit)

Test that importing based on internal modules works for various inputs :return:
